# Tic Tic Pou

> Official site for Tic Tic Pou — a class-based circle game. This llms.txt provides LLM-friendly pointers to core pages, policies, and related resources for retrieval at inference time.

Content is intended for retrieval usage by assistants and agents. Please provide attribution when quoting or summarizing. Content is shared under the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license.

## Core pages

- [Home](/): Site overview and navigation
- [Rules](/rules): Game rules and explanations
- [Classes](/classes): Class descriptions and abilities
- [Game modes](/modos): Available modes and how they work
- [Ranking](/ranking): Leaderboards and standings
- [Matches](/partidas): Match list and editor
- [Privacy policy](/politica-de-privacidade): Data usage and your rights

## Policies & meta

- [Robots.txt](/robots.txt): Crawling and indexing rules
- [Sitemap](/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages for discovery
- [llms.txt](/llms.txt): This curated index for LLMs
- [License (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/): Terms of use and sharing

## Repositories

- [Main project (TicTicPou)](https://github.com/Markkop/TicTicPou): Game source code
- [Website (ticticpou-website)](https://github.com/Markkop/ticticpou-website): This website source
- [Jogos Lúdicos](https://github.com/Markkop/JogosLudicos): Related learning and games

## Optional

- [Itch.io page](https://mark17.itch.io/ticticpou-3d): Playable demo and downloads

Contact: [me@markkop.dev](mailto:me@markkop.dev)

Last updated: 2025-08-28
